title: Oriental chicken salad
description: This spicy, crunchy salad is low in fat but full of flavour - perfect for a healthy dinner.Each serving provides 216kcal, 26g protein, 14g carbohydrate (of which 13g sugars), 6g fat (of which 1g saturates), 2g fibre and 	0.9g salt.
ingredients: 2.5cm/1in piece fresh ginger, peeled and grated
small bunch of fresh coriander, roughly chopped
1 large carrot, cut into fine matchsticks
½ cucumber, peeled, halved, de-seeded and cut into matchsticks
